Text: Re Whats upPST Hi John Glad to hear from you How is everything I am glad the bank deal will go through and you will put UBS Energy Trading in your business card Thanks for your message I will check it out Have a nice day George Huan Original Message From Griffith John John NRONcom To Sent Monday December PM Subject FW Whats up George Check these guys out They are a consulting firm Jeff Young used to be my boss Let me know John Original Message From Jeff Young Jeff AConsultingcomENRON Sent Monday December PM To Griffith John Subject RE Whats up Surehave them forward resumes and look at our website wwwpaconsultingcom Jeff Original Message From mailto Sent Friday December AM To Jeff Young Subject Whats up There are alot of people getting laid off over here Do you guys have any openings Can I send them your way to talk to them I am talking experience from the trade floor down to clerks Thanks for any help that you can give John This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
